scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace zoo-server-standalone dev" "yarn workspace zoo-web dev"
scripts.dev:zebra: concurrently "yarn workspace zebra-server dev" "yarn workspace zebra-web dev"
scripts.dev:aardvark: cross-env Z_ORIGIN="http://localhost:3988" concurrently "yarn workspace aardvark-server dev" "yarn workspace zoo-web dev"
scripts.dev:mobile: watchman watch-del-all && yarn workspace zoo-mobile start
scripts.dev:ios:xcode: yarn workspace zoo-mobile prebuild && open apps/zoo-mobile/ios/Zerve.xcworkspace
scripts.gambit: concurrently "yarn workspace gambit-server dev" "yarn workspace gambit-web dev"
scripts.aardvark:build: yarn workspace aardvark-server build && yarn workspace zoo-web build
scripts.aardvark:start: cross-env Z_ORIGIN="http://localhost:3988" concurrently "yarn workspace aardvark-server start" "yarn workspace zoo-web start"
